name: Dungeon Builder
description:
A short game for the GDQ One Mechanic Game Jam 6. It's a card/puzzle game(?).  Also my first project ever. Done with gamemaker. It's not good be warned.

Story: A sheep wants to become the greates Dungeon Builder in sheep history. He has to face great challenges in those dungeons of his, like slimes or even worse...slimes with daggers! His life goal is to build the biggest dungeon of all time containing as much as 20 cards.
